basics.name: Joel Eidsmo
basics.label: Software leader with hands on experience
basics.summary: Technical leader with hands-on production industry experience. Strong background in process control, digitalization, and cross-functional coordination.

work.name: Northvolt
work.position: Project Manager IT & Digitalization / Digital Area Lead – Formation & Aging
work.summary: Responsible for digitalization efforts in manufacturing. As area lead, accountable for digital priorities and coordination for one of the factory buildings in Skellefteå.
highlights: Led MES integration with warehouse systems, enabling transition from manual handling to full digital traceability

Led a team to build a scalable packaging sequencing service to handle packaging of multiple products in a single packing machine and owned the product. Project was delivered within scope as planned, and managed continously.
Key enabler for over 10x throughput increase in the process
Maintained production downtime from digital systems below 1%

work.name: Northvolt
work.summary: Built team and processes for technical support in production.
highlights: Created procedures and Jira workflows for first-line support

work.name: Northvolt and Boliden, Rönnskär (via Adecco and internal roles)
work.summary: Held multiple hands-on roles in high-tech production environments.
highlights: Cleanroom operations, safety, and quality control
Built strong practical understanding of production systems

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Worked with sound design and audio production for media.
highlights: Handled entire production chain from concept to delivery
